title: “Freezing” Intermediate Phase for Efficient and Stable FAPbI3 Perovskite Solar Cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00865K, Paper
Muyang Chen, Tingting Niu, Lingfeng Chao, Xiaozheng Duan, Jinpei Wang, Tengfei Pan, Yajing Li, Junhan Zhang, Chenyue Wang, Biyun Ren, Lijuan Guo, Mohammad Hatamvand, Jing Zhang, Qingxun Guo, Yingdong Xia, Xingyu Gao, Yonghua Chen
The most promising formamdinium lead triiodide (FAPbI3) has attracted extensive attention due to its record-breaking single-junction cell efficiency in perovskite solar cells (PSCs). However, the formation of α-FAPbI3 often requires...
